pageTitle: Debate: Should the United States be a gun-free country? | Debate.org
textBeforeTable: Aned 2 years ago Vote Placed by Report this Vote 6 records. 1 through 6 votes have been placed for this debate. Showing Report this Comment To what extent is a gun-free America gun-free? Do you mean that in a gun-free America, citizens are banned from having guns or do you mean that every person who is part of the U.S., Citizen, law enforcement, military, or otherwise, are banned from having firearms?
